entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Claresholm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Claresholm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Claresholm 07:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -18.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -20.8°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow at times heavy beginning late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
